title: Balanced Health: Body, Mind & Spirit
content:
Health isn't just physical—it's mental and spiritual too. Leaders need energy, clarity and purpose to perform consistently.

Daily practices that support holistic health include:
- Regular exercise
- Mindfulness or meditation
- Connecting with purpose (through values, nature or spirituality)

Sleep, hydration, and digital balance also play huge roles in performance and resilience.

A healthy leader influences others to grow—not just in results, but in well-being too.
